trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bulk copy operation should be aborted.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the bulk copy operation should be aborted; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that returns the number of rows copied during the current bulk copy operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: int that returns the number of rows copied.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
